catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Gikatilla, Joseph ben Abraham
description: Contents: Shem Tov ben Joseph ben Shem Tov ibn Shem Tov, Sefer ha-Emunot (ff. 1r-113v). Jacob ben Sheshet Gerondi, Meshiv devarim nekhoḥim (f. 114). Naḥmanides, Liḳuṭe ḳabalah (ff. 114v-116v). Anonymous, Sodot (ff. 116v-137r). Perushim le-agadot ha-Talmud (ff. 138r-140v). Hirts Shats, Naftule Elohim niftalti (printed in Ferrara, 1556) (ff. 144r-183r). Joseph ben Abraham Gikatilla, Sod bat Shevaʿ (ff. 184r-186r). Moses ben Shem Tov de Leon, Ḥibur ba-ḳabalah (extracts) (ff. 186r-198r). Abraham ben Samuel Abulafia, Ḥaye ha-ʿolam ha-ba (extracts) (ff. 198v-206r).
